text: Rex Maynard Linn (born November 13, 1956) is an American actor. He is best known for playing the role of Sgt. Frank Tripp in the CBS drama CSI: Miami and Kevin Wachtell in the television series Better Call Saul. He also played Richard Travers in the 1993 action thriller movie Cliffhanger. From 2017 to 2024, he played Principal Tom Peterson on Young Sheldon. Linn was born in Perryton, Texas. He was raised in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma. He was inspired by Jack Nicholson in One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest to become an actor. Linn has been dating country singer and actress Reba McEntire since late 2020. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Texas Category:Actors from Oklahoma City
title: Rex Linn
